interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: OULAC Shine to Shine Velvet Matte Lipstick, Long Lasting Creamy Formula, Opaque Finish, Vegan Friendly, 3.6 grams / 0.12 ounces, Cranberries (Y09)
Review Date: 2021/11/05
Store: Oulac
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 0.68 x 0.68 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'velvet-matte-Y09'}
Review Text: This lipstick is gorgeous! Applies very easily and comes in a steel lipstick container that seems very durable. Super cute packaging and the product goes on without issue. It does smudge some but as it’s not a matte product that’s to be expected, it’s also not drying and feels great on the lips for all day wear.
Review Title: Beautiful, vibrant colors with nice smell
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
3D Mink Eyelashes Natural Long Lashes 2 in 1 Self-adhesive Eyeliner Instead of Adhesive 5 Different Styles Pairs Kits Sets with Tweezers , NO NEED GLUE PURELEOR {'Brand': 'PURELEOR', 'Material': 'Mink Fur', 'Item Form': 'Pair', 'Mounting Type': 'Eyelash Glue', 'Unit Count': '5.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9 x 6 x 1 inches; 2.4 Ounces', 'UPC': '750810450143'} Pros: it came with everything pictured, a lash applicator, the tube of “eyeliner glue” and 5 pairs of lashes in varying thickness. The box itself was nicely packaged. For reference, I used the thinnest/most natural pair at the top for my review.

Cons: the tube of eyeliner was either sitting so long it completely dried up, or the glue caused the eyeliner to adhere to the inside of the tube, but it was almost impossible to get ANY of the liner on my lid.

When I finally got a line to go on, it was akin to what attempting to using a dried up Expo on whiteboard looks like- I had to scrub the pen on my eyelid in an attempt to lay down any product at all, resulting in a very pitiful looking eyeliner application.

I fixed the lashes to the appropriate area, and within 5 minutes they were coming off at the corners. I tried to remedy the overall result somewhat by adding my own liner, and that example is on the second photo, bottom right corner (photo with eyeshadow applied).

The lashes themselves were the quality you’d expect from a multi pack at this price. Some of the individual lashes had fallen out as I opened the package as well.

Final thoughts: just use eyelash glue and get quality lashes. It doesn’t take any more time to apply and at least you can apply eyeliner to suit your taste. Glue + Eyeliner probably shouldn’t mix 7JHH WIGS Long Wavy Curly Wig With Bangs Natural Hair Dye Wig for Women (25inch, Red) 7JHH WIGS {'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy, Curly', 'Brand': '7JHH WIGS', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '13.78 x 8.66 x 1.57 inches; 12.7 Ounces', 'UPC': '682601933330'} This wig is nice but a little thin, the value for money is great though. The bangs especially are really cute if you get them positioned correctly. Nice wig, a little thin OULAC Shine to Shine Velvet Matte Lipstick, Long Lasting Creamy Formula, Opaque Finish, Vegan Friendly, 3.6 grams / 0.12 ounces, Cranberries (Y09) Oulac {'Brand': 'Oulac', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Velvet', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting,Shine', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Product Dimensions': '3.9 x 0.68 x 0.68 inches; 1.23 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'velvet-matte-Y09'} This lipstick is gorgeous! Applies very easily and comes in a steel lipstick container that seems very durable. Super cute packaging and the product goes on without issue. It does smudge some but as it’s not a matte product that’s to be expected, it’s also not drying and feels great on the lips for all day wear. Beautiful, vibrant colors with nice smell
profile:
The user has a keen interest in beauty products, particularly those that prioritize practicality and ease of use, such as eyelashes, eyeliner, and now lip products. They value convenience and have a notable preference for self-adhesive items but have previously faced disappointment with product performance—especially concerning eyeliner effectiveness and lash quality. While they appreciate a variety of styles and attractive packaging, their critical approach suggests a tendency to opt for traditional adhesive methods for better results. 

Recent interactions indicate an expanding interest in various beauty categories, including hair products, with a recent purchase of a wig that, despite being deemed a bit thin, was appreciated for its overall value and cute design. 

Their latest experience with a lipstick reflects their ongoing search for quality, as they praised its ease of application, durability, and aesthetics, rating it highly despite acknowledging minor smudging. This illustrates their preference for high-quality items over budget options, emphasizing usability and effectiveness. Overall, the user seeks beauty products that seamlessly blend aesthetics with functionality, prioritizing both comfort and usability in their routines, while remaining open to investing in products that meet or exceed their expectations.
